name: White Waters
description: A scenic recreational area featuring waterfalls, picnic spots, and tranquil surroundings ideal for family outings.

name: Zimbabwe Military Museum
description: Zimbabwe’s only military museum, showcasing military aircraft, vehicles, weapons, and the history of the country’s armed forces.

name: Naletale Ruins
address: Near Shangani, 30 km northwest of Gweru, Zimbabwe
description: Ancient stone ruins from the Torwa State, known for intricate decorative walls and historical significance similar to Great Zimbabwe.

name: Runde River
description: A major river that supports wildlife and local agriculture, popular for birdwatching and scenic walks.

name: Mberengwa Hills
description: Picturesque hills rich in minerals and cultural history, offering great hiking opportunities and ancestral stories.

name: Lake Mutirikwi (Southern Tip)
description: The southern tip of this large lake is perfect for boating, fishing, and relaxing by the water with nearby views of wildlife.

name: Boterekwa Pass
description: A dramatic mountain pass with winding roads through granite cliffs—ideal for photography and sightseeing.

name: Antelope Park
address: 13 km from Gweru, Vungu Road, Zimbabwe
description: A private game reserve offering up-close wildlife encounters, lion conservation, horseback safaris, and lodging.
